scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../phonebook-frontend/ &&  npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../phonebook-backend && cd ../phonebook-backend/
scripts.build:ui:win: del dist /f /q && cd ../phonebook-frontend/ &&  npm install && npm run build && xcopy .\dist ..\phonebook-backend\dist /Y /E /H /C /I
